Â«Â NOWARÂ Â»

Peace is the ultimate aspiration of humanity, a state of tranquility and harmony that brings about prosperity and happiness to all.

The value of peace cannot be overstated. It allows individuals, communities, and nations to pursue their goals and aspirations in a safe and secure environment. When people are free from fear and conflict, they are able to focus their energies on improving their lives and contributing to the betterment of society.

Cosmo Danchin-Hamard, artwork drawn on February 28 2022.
